title: Friends Client Bugging
body:
Hey I have a friend who posted on the board a good 6 days ago and has had no response.

His issue is that when he is in the client and tries to create a game, whenever he goes to launch queue it says a player is not ready. And even when it does launch the Match Found screen doesn't appear.

If anyone has any solutions please let me know asap as this has been an ongoing issue for him and is ruining his experience.

Cheers
